name: Shohei Nobuhara
content: :: Shohei Nobuhara, Ph.D. :: Shohei Nobuhara, Ph.D. Professor, Kyoto Institute of Technology Activity Database on Education and Research, Kyoto Institute of Technology Google Scholar Areas of interest Computer Vision 3D video / 3D shape and motion from multi-view images / markerless motion capture Human behavior analysis Academic Degrees Ph.D. (Infomatics) Kyoto University, 2005. M.Sc. (Infomatics) Kyoto University, 2002. B.Sc. (Engineering) Kyoto University, 2000.
